pageTitle: 2011 Copa América squads - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {2118=Players marked (c) were named as captain for their national squad. Number of caps, goals, players' club teams and players' age as of July 1, 2011 – the tournament's opening day., 1355=The 2011 Copa América was an international football tournament held in Argentina from July 1 to July 24, 2011. The twelve national teams involved in the tournament were required to register a squad of 22 players, or 23 players if the team chooses to have three goalkeepers; only players in these squads were eligible to take part in the tournament.[1] Each nation's squad of players will be given shirt numbers 1–23.[1]}
